title: End of the road for Faf as he is omitted from Proteas T20I World Cup squad
snippet: Thursday's announcement of the Proteas squad for the men's T20I World Cup officially signalled the end of an era with Faf du Plessis and Imran Tahir omitted.

title: Continuing Resumed Session, Non-Governmental Organizations Approves 8 Entities for Special Status, Defers Action on 17 Others
snippet: The Committee on Non-Governmental Organizations recommended 8 entities for special consultative status with the Economic and Social Council and deferred action on the status of 17 others, as it continued its resumed 2021 session today.

title: The Latest: Arizona gov: Biden 'overreaching' with new rule
snippet: PHOENIX — Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey says President Joe Biden is overreaching with his new requirement for employees of large businesses to be vaccinated or regularly tested for COVID-19. The Republican governor said the Biden rule "requires pushback and response" but declined to say how the state would respond.

title: Sri Lanka extends COVID-19 lockdown to September 21
snippet: Sri Lanka's ongoing COVID-19 lockdown has been extended till 4am September 21, health minister Keheliya Rambukwella said.
